_comment: Development Version (36 items) of the Psychologically Rich Life Questionnaire
datasetApaReference: Oishi, S., Choi, H., Buttrick, N., Heintzelman, S. J., Kushlev, K., Westgate, E. C., Tucker, J., Ebersole, C. R., Axt, J., Gilbert, E., Ng, B. W., & Besser, L. L. (2019). The psychologically rich life questionnaire. Journal of Research in Personality, 81, 257–270. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jrp.2019.06.010

instruments.instrumentName: Psychologically Rich Life Questionnaire - Development Version
instruments.instrumentUrl: Oishi, S., Choi, H., Buttrick, N., Heintzelman, S. J., Kushlev, K., Westgate, E. C., Tucker, J., Ebersole, C. R., Axt, J., Gilbert, E., Ng, B. W., & Besser, L. L. (2019). The psychologically rich life questionnaire. Journal of Research in Personality, 81, 257–270. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jrp.2019.06.010

items.itemStemText: My life has been psychologically rich.
My life has been experientially rich.
My life has been emotionally rich.
I have had a lot of interesting experiences.
I have had a lot of novel experiences.
I have had a lot of difficult experiences.
My life has been full of unique, unusual experiences.
My life consists of rich, intense moments.
My life has been dramatic.
I have acquired different perspectives on life.
I experience a full range of emotions fairly regularly via literature, films, sports, and others.
I experience a full range of emotions via first-hand experiences such as travel and attending concerts.
I have a lot of personal life stories to tell others.
On my deathbed, I am likely to say “I had an interesting life.”
On my deathbed, I am likely to say “I have seen and learned a lot.”
My life would make a good novel or movie.
I like serendipity (unexpectedly finding valuable things or experiences).
I would rather do something interesting than something just fun.
Many of my best memories in life come from unexpected events.
My life has been monotonous.
I often feel bored with my life.
My life has been uneventful.
My life has been stable.
I lead a predictable life.
My life is full of routines.
Everyday is pretty much the same.
My life has been very typical of anyone with a similar background.
I have not had much adversity in my life.
My life has been easy.
My life has been simple.
I seek out mental stimulation.
I seek out adventures, either first-hand or vicariously.
I pay attention to the details.
My life has been dominated by a singular emotion.
I can’t remember the last time I’ve done or experienced something new.
I’ve learned more from my own experiences and from the experiences of others than I have through academics.
